author.name: Licensed by Woolworths  ©️ Dorling Kindersley Ltd

description: Try our easy to follow Roasted Chicory Mocha recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Roasted Chicory Mocha Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 tbs coarsely ground roasted chicory root

recipeInstructions.text: Place the roasted chicory and cacao nibs (including husks) in a teapot.
Add the boiling water and leave to infuse for 4 minutes.
Strain the infusion into cups or mugs and sweeten with honey or sugar to taste. Serve at once.
